txt.en: Nature's Salve is an area heal available in bear form.
Nature's Salve is an area heal available in bear form.

Mark of Beorn alters the following skills if present on the target: 
 
 Grisly Cry: 
 Becomes an Area Effect Fear around the target. 
 
 Piercing Roar: 
 Doubles the debuff on the target. 
 
 Vicious Claws: 
 Lowers the target's chance to hit.
